code: import axios from'axios';var url='https://enigmatic-sierra-36050.herokuapp.com/';var movie_url='movie/';var home_url='home/';var profile_url='authentication/profile/';var board_url='getboard/';var board_id_url='getboard/id';var getAll=function getAll(user_id){return axios.post(url+home_url,{userid:user_id});};var getByID=function getByID(movie_id,user_id){var new_url=url+movie_url+movie_id;return axios.post(new_url,{movie_id:movie_id,user_id:user_id});};var getProfile=function getProfile(user_id,board_id){return axios.post(url+profile_url,{user_id:user_id,board_id:board_id});};var getProfileBoards=function getProfileBoards(user_id){return axios.post(url+profile_url+board_url,{user_id:user_id});};var getProfileBoard=function getProfileBoard(user_id,board_id){return axios.post(url+profile_url+board_id_url,{user_id:user_id,board_id:board_id});};export default{getAll:getAll,getByID:getByID,getProfile:getProfile,getProfileBoards:getProfileBoards,getProfileBoard:getProfileBoard};
